name: Levirtue Dragon
desc:
2 Level 3 monsters
If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Virtue Stream" from your Deck to your hand. You can activate 1 of these effects;
● Detach 1 Xyz Material from a monster you control, then add 1 Fish, Sea Serpent, or Aqua monster from your GY to your hand, except "Levirtue Dragon".
● Target 2 Xyz Monsters on the field; detach 1 material from 1 of them and attach it to the other as material.
You can only use each effect of "Levirtue Dragon" once per turn.
